title: Electric potential - charges on a line

content.description: Two small spheres are arranged along a line and have net charges of <math alttext="positive 2 Q" overflow="scroll"> <mo>+</mo> <mn>2</mn> <mi>Q</mi> </math> and <math alttext="negative Q" overflow="scroll"><mo>-</mo><mi>Q</mi></math>, as shown. The vertical tick marks are all equally spaced.
content.question: At which of the labeled locations in the figure is the electric potential the greatest?

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
